title: stuck at 99%(applying patch), then after 5 min show error!(update failed)
body:
please help!
yesterday i play LOL (i update LOL and see Ivern in game and ...) but today i noticed massage from LOL:
u have some corruption and start scanning file and calculate differences!
after scanning 900 file start applying patch at 99% then after 5 minutes error happen:update failed!
i press OK and LOL starts calculate differences then again applying patch and again update failed!
i stuck in this loop! please help,

replies.body: During that phase in the process, the patcher needs to download files and update it to your client.  A bad or slow connection could have caused a hiccup.  After it ran for a while, it may have finally been able to catch up and finish applying the patch.  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to optimize your connection and prevent a slow down like this happening again.  Hope that helps!

Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help!  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get you a set of logs, and attach it to the ticket for context.
